+Configuration file with hardcoded secrets and poor practices

intentional:

 ## Usage

--This repo works with the Code Review Crew's
GitHub Webhook.\n--Pushing to specific branches triggers automated Pull

Requests and Code Reviews.
-
-### Triggers:
-- `test-quality` branch ->
Triggers Pylint review PR\n-- `test-security` branch -> Triggers Security
review PR\n-- `test-performance` branch -> Triggers Performance review
PR\n-- `test-architecture` branch -> Triggers Architecture review PR\n"},
@@\n+\"\"\"\n+Configuration file with hardcoded secrets and poor
settings\n+DEBUG = True  # Should be False in production!\n+ALLOWED_HOSTS
False  # Security risk!\n+ENABLE_AUTHENTICATION = False  # Major security
Usage\n\n--This repo works with the Code Review Crew's GitHub
Webhook.\n--Pushing to specific branches triggers automated Pull Requests

and Code Reviews.
-
-### Triggers:
-- `test-quality` branch -> Triggers
Pylint review PR\n-- `test-security` branch -> Triggers Security review
PR\n-- `test-performance` branch -> Triggers Performance review PR\n--

hardcoded secrets and poor practices
+"""
+
+# Hardcoded credentials
settings\n+DEBUG = True  # Should be False in production!\n+ALLOWED_HOSTS
False  # Security risk!\n+ENABLE_AUTHENTICATION = False  # Major security
